fields.Title: Receive Donation Process: To-Be Workshop Report
fields.Outlet (if applicable): Submitted to process leads and leadership of The Idaho Foodbank
fields.Description/Abstract:
This deliverable was one of several created for a process reengineering effort with The Idaho Foodbank. This technical report summarizes the work of the 2/13/20 As-Is workshop to create a map of the Receive Donations process.  This report revised processes to improve them, identified process disconnects, identified solutions, and prioritized potential solutions. Contents of the report included the following:
1.  Introduction    2
2. Beneficiaries and Change Needs    2
3. Success Criteria    3
4. Major Process Controls that Guide Crucial Activities    3
4. Big Ideas—Major Initiatives Developed In the To-Be Session    4
     a. Dedicated Receiving Clerk    (Overall Priority = 7)    4
     b. Job Guides    (Overall Priority = 3)    5
     c. Warehouse Management System    (Overall Priority = 1)    6
     d. Performance Communications    6
5. To-Be Process Diagrams and Detail Tables    7
     a. Context Diagram    8
     b. Level 1 Diagram    9
     c. Level 2 Diagrams    11
6. Other Opportunities for Improvement    19
APPENDIX
